body.p: For each document, a rough structuring is applied within the <text> area, consisting of three areas: a <front> area, which contains the title section, a <body> area, in which the body of the text is located, and possibly a <back> area, in which all annexes are combined.

There are no other elements outside of these container elements, i. e. the <body> tag that opens follows directly after the concluding </front> tag, i. e. it is still before each new page break. Likewise, the opening <back> tag follows directly after the closing </body> tag, again before every new page break.
